name: Akshara Educational and Welfare Society

address: D-No:2-35/2, Shiva Sai Nagar, Narava Village, Pendurthi Mandal

briefDescription: Running a Rehabilitation Center for the Orphan, Semi-Orphan & Vulnerable Children. Present Strength of the Orphanage is 33 members.Working with women unit in training with Tailoring  , Food Preservation.Provide education for 33 children from rehabilitation center, 65 children from the surround areas.Nutritional Support for nearly 300 downtrodden family.Conducting of health camps & medical support to poor old aged. Conducting of Medical Eye Checkup & operations with Rotary Eye Bank.
